title: Election Year Knockout
description: Create your own political party, lace up your boxing gloves, and punch your way to the White House in Election Year Knockout! In a country torn apart by its political divide, the nation has resorted to boxing to settle its differences. Fight your way through hilarious political opponents from both sides of the aisle before squaring off with president Donald Thump himself Tiny Thor

system_requirements.Processor: First generation Intel i3 or equivalent
